name: Escape 2: New Order
description: Escape2: The New Order, is an extension of the famous first-person shooter. The second part tells the story of CIA agent named Nick Lobottom, in the year 1970. The main character is sent to a secret hideout, run by Nazis, who continue to run their experiments. You go through 5 chilling levels to fight the final boss. Be sure it will not be easy.
